thread.title: Russell Potocki
thread.title_full: CANDY CLUB reviewed by Russell Potocki

author: Russell Potocki
title: Russell Potocki
text: So I signed up for candy club. It's a subscription service that delivers candy to your doorstep. I signed up and got 45 dollars worth of candy for 20 dollars. It's great candy I'll definitely do it again. I got green apple hard candy, green apple sour belts, green apple and strawberry sour belts, fair flavor of salt water taffy, swedish fish,and this crazy licorice assortment of filled licorice and licorice rope called fini kollisions. And they even though in free awesome hard candy! And nifty little description cards with pictures and nutrition facts! I love candy club. And no this is not an ADD and I don't toot anyone like ever. But I am completely happy and enjoying it that dang much!
